    public class Knob
extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox
    Custom Knob for JavaFX.

      • Knob

        public Knob(String name,
            double min,
            double max,
            double precision,
            double defaultValue)
        Constructs a knob with values from range min to max.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the knob
        min - the min value
        max - the max value
        precision - the precision between each value
        defaultValue - the defaultValue

      • Knob

        public Knob(String name,
            double min,
            double max,
            double precision)
        Constructs a knob with values from range min to max. The default value is set to min.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the knob
        min - the min value
        max - the max value
        precision - the precision between each value
